heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly to partly sunny, except mostly cloudy far north, and from the Hudson Valley into Bennington County and the Berkshires. Highs from the mid teens to around 20, some lower teens far north. West to southwest winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers north and in the southern Greens; a trace to an inch. Lows in the single digits to around 10 above in the Champlain Valley, otherwise zero to ten below, with cold spots around 15 below. West to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph, and diminishing.

heading: Thursday
text: Partly cloudy in southern valleys and in the Champlain Valley, otherwise mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers north and in the southern Greens; another trace to an inch. Highs from the mid teens to around 20 in southern valleys and in the Champlain Valley, low to mid teens elsewhere north. West winds 5 to 10 mph.
